properties.areaDesc: Fire Island Inlet NY to Moriches Inlet NY out 20 nm; Moriches Inlet NY to Montauk Point NY out 20 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued February 6 at 3:40PM EST until February 8 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Upton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, west winds 25 to 35 kt with gusts
up to 45 kt and seas 10 to 15 feet expected. For the Small
Craft Advisory, seas 5 to 8 feet.

* WHERE...Moriches Inlet NY to Montauk Point NY out 20 nm and
Fire Island Inlet NY to Moriches Inlet NY out 20 nm.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 6 AM Friday to 6 AM EST
Saturday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 6 AM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST FRIDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM FRIDAY TO 6 AM EST SATURDAY
